Ecosystem FAQ License Sphere Tracing

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is Kepler Free?

A: Yes.

Q: Is it Open Source?

A: Yes. MIT License. Fork us here.

Q: What is Sphere Tracing?

A: Lots of math. It uses the distance to the nearest surface instead of triange rasterization. If you like math and code, have a look here.

Q: What’s a No-poly Mesh?

A: A mesh that doesn’t use any polygons, rather a series of primitive 3d objects. Read more.
